definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
fundamental theorem of algebra (every polynomial has a complex root)
pinyin: dai4 shu4 xue2 ji1 ben3 ding4 li3
Guo2 ji4 Shu4 xue2 Lian2 meng2

sentences.english: In this paper, we propose a mathematical model of planar reflector on the Solar pond.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了太阳池反射板的数学模型，并进行了计算。

sentences.english: It is often combined with elements of numerology .
sentences.chinese: 通常，风水还与占数学的原理结合起来使用。

sentences.english: The very major problem that Chinese mathematics faces is lack of leadership.
sentences.chinese: 当今中国数学界面对的大难，便是缺乏领导者。

sentences.english: She was embarrassed when they kept telling her she had a genius for mathematics.
sentences.chinese: 他们总是对她说她有数学蠢才，她觉得很不好心思。

sentences.english: Learn how Montessori teaches mathematics in this free video clip.
sentences.chinese: 了解如何在这个自由蒙台梭利教数学的视频剪辑。

sentences.english: The feasibility of applying fuzzy mathematics method to appraise manuscript quality is studied. How to apply Method No.
sentences.chinese: 探讨应用模糊数学方法评价论文稿质量的可行性。

sentences.english: My extracurricular activities include the Math and Drama Clubs.
sentences.chinese: 我的课余活动包括参加数学兴趣小组和戏剧社。

sentences.english: Nana pulled an all-nighter to study for her math exam.
sentences.chinese: 为了应付数学考试，娜娜学了一个通宵。

sentences.english: A mathematical model for optimizing topological design of local-area networks is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了计算机局域网优化设计问题的数学模型。

sentences.english: These maths questions really baffled Xiao Ming.
sentences.chinese: 堆不会做的数学题，小明直发怔。

sentences.english: Let's now examine the convolution a bit more as a mathematical entity.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们进一步考察卷积的数学问题。

sentences.english: All you have to do is get an A on the next test, and then you can pass Math!
sentences.chinese: 你只要在下一次考试拿A就行啦，你的数学就能过了。

sentences.english: It is easier to square the circle than to get round a mathematician.
sentences.chinese: 从数学家面前混过去比“化圆为方”还难。

sentences.english: Do not let the math jargon intimidate you.
sentences.chinese: 可别让这些数学术语把你吓倒。

sentences.english: She is digging away at her mathematics lessons.
sentences.chinese: 她在不停地刻苦钻研数学。

sentences.english: The two thoughts have ever greatly contributed to the development of mathematics.
sentences.chinese: 这两种思想对数学发展都曾起过巨大作用。

definition: literature and language/(PRC) Chinese (as a school subject)
abbr. for mathematics 數學|数学[shu4 xue2], physics 物理[wu4 li3] and chemistry 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
calculus/differentiation and integration/calculus of infinitesimals 微 and integrals 積|积
the sciences (as opposed to the humanities 文科[wen2 ke1])
